name: 甘奈
text:
あっ、千雪さん！
見て見て～
trans:
Ah, Chiyuki!
Look!

name: 千雪
text:
おはよう、甘奈ちゃん
どうしたの？
trans:
Good morning, Amana.
What's the matter?

name: 甘奈
text:
これ見てよ～
事務所に来る途中で見つけた、かわいー猫☆
trans:
Take a look at this.
It's a cute cat I saw while I'm on my way here to the office.

name: 千雪
text:
わぁ、可愛い茶トラさん
甘奈ちゃん、写真を撮るのが上手なのね
trans:
What a cute red tabby cat.
You're really good in taking pictures, Amana.

name: 甘奈
text:
えへ、ありがと～
自撮りとか色々撮ってるからかな☆
trans:
Ehe, thanks for the compliment.
I guess it's because I've been taking pictures like doing selfies and whatnot.

name: 千雪
text:
たしかに！　甘奈ちゃん、
いつもツイスタに可愛い写真載せてるよね
trans:
Yes.
And you're always putting cute pictures on Twister.

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ
それほどでも～
trans:
Ehehe,
Yeah but it could be better.

name: 千雪
text:
自撮りかぁ……
私もやってみたほうがいいのかなぁ
trans:
Taking selfies...
Maybe I should try that too.

name: 甘奈
text:
え！　千雪さんの自撮り、絶対見たい！
ていうか一緒に撮ろうよ～！
trans:
Ooh! I so want to see your selfies!
Or rather, let's take one with the two of us now!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、そうね
じゃあ、お願いします♪
trans:
Fufu Okay.
I'll be in your hands now.

name: 甘奈
text:
やったぁ！
じゃあ、まずは……
trans:
Alright!
So, first...

name: 甘奈
text:
ピースから！
いぇ～い☆
trans:
We go "Peace"!
Yeah!

name: 千雪
text: ピース♪
trans: Peace♪

name: 甘奈
text:
じゃあ次はこんな感じでポーズして☆
がおー！
trans:
For the next one, we do this kind of pose.
Roar!

name: 千雪
text: ……がおー？
trans: ...Roar?

name: 甘奈
text:
めっちゃいい感じだよ～☆
じゃあ、これを加工するねっ
trans:
You're doing great.
Okay, so I'll touch this up.

name: 甘奈
text:
うーん
フィルターは……これがいいかなー
trans:
Hmm...
As for the filter... Maybe this one will do.

name: 千雪
text: すごい、手際いいのねぇ
trans: Wow, you're good at this.

name: 甘奈
text: あとは、ポーズに合わせて……
trans: Next, to match it with our poses...

name: 千雪
text: わぁ、耳がついた♪
trans: Oh, you've added the ears♪

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへっ
さっきの猫みたいでしょー？
trans:
Ehehe,
We look like the cat from earlier, don't we?

name: 甘奈
text: あとはペンで『がおー』って書いて……
trans: Then I put the caption "Roar" on it...

name: 甘奈
text:
できたーっ☆
見て見て、かわいーよー？
trans:
All done.
Look, isn't it cute here?

name: 千雪
text:
本当、可愛い～！
それに、すごく色々できるのね……！
trans:
You're right, it is cute!
Not to mention, there are so many things you can do to it!

name: 千雪
text:
……ねぇ、よかったら
もっとやってみてもいい？
trans: ...Well, if you don't mind, is it alright if we take more pictures?

name: 甘奈
text: うん！　やろーやろー☆
trans: Sure! Let's do more.

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、このうさ耳千雪さん、
めっちゃかわいーよ～？
trans: Ah, this bunny-eared Chiyuki is totally cute!

name: 千雪
text:
え～そうかなぁ……！
ふふ、なんだか恥ずかしい……
trans:
Eh? You think so?
Fufu, that kinda makes me embarrassed.

name: 甘奈
text: この写真、千雪さんのツイスタに載せるのはどうかな？
trans: How about uploading this picture to your Twister account?

name: 千雪
text:
……そうね、せっかく甘奈ちゃんが
自撮りを教えてくれたんだもの……！
trans: Well, since this is the one of the things we took when you were teaching me to take selfies, so...

name: 甘奈
text:
やったーっ！
甘奈のアカウントでもシェアしとくねっ
trans:
Alright!
Please share it too to my account.

name: 甘奈
text: あ、甘奈はこっちの写真にしよーっと、いいかな？
trans: Ah, maybe I should go with this picture?

name: 千雪
text: うん、大丈夫よ
trans: Yes, that will be just fine.

name: 千雪
text:
……わぁ、
もうこんな時間なのね……！
trans: Oh, it's already this late.

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、ほんとだ！
楽しくて時間忘れてたかも☆
trans:
Oh, you're right!
We were having so much fun that we forgot about the time.

name: 千雪
text:
ね、本当に楽しかった
ありがとうね、甘奈ちゃん
trans:
Yes, it is fun.
Thank you, Amana-chan.

name: 甘奈
text: ううん、こちらこそだよ！
trans: No, I should be thanking you!

name: 甘奈
text:
ねぇねぇ、千雪さん
今度は甜花ちゃんも入れて３人で撮ろうね！
trans: Say, Chiyuki, how about we include Tenka next time and have a picture of the three of us together?

name: 千雪
text: ええ、そうしましょう♪
trans: Yes, let's do that♪
